metrics.description: Percentage of CPU units that are reserved by running tasks in the cluster. Under 20% (green) to over 80% (red)

job.template: CPU_RESERVATION = data("CPUReservation", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/ECS") and filter("stat", "mean") and filter("ClusterName", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=["ClusterName"])

metrics.description: Percentage of CPU units that are used in the cluster or service. Under 20% (green) to over 80% (red)

job.template: CPU_UTILIZATION = data("CPUUtilization", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/ECS") and filter("stat", "mean") and not filter("ServiceName", "*") and filter("ClusterName", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["ClusterName"])

metrics.description: Percentage of memory that is reserved by running tasks in the cluster. Under 20% (green) to over 80% (red)

job.template: MEMORY_RESERVED = data("MemoryReservation", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/ECS") and filter("stat", "mean") and filter("ClusterName", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=["ClusterName"])

metrics.description: Percentage of memory that is used in the cluster or service. Under 20% (green) to over 80% (red)

job.template: MEMORY_UTILIZATION = data("MemoryUtilization", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/ECS") and filter("stat", "mean") and not filter("ServiceName", "*") and filter("ClusterName", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["ClusterName"])

metrics.description: Number of running services on a cluster

job.template: NUM_SERVICES = data("CPUUtilization", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/ECS") and filter("stat", "mean") and filter("ServiceName", "*") and filter("ClusterName", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).count(by=["ServiceName"])

metrics.description: Number of running tasks on a cluster

job.template: NUM_TASKS = data("CPUUtilization", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/ECS") and filter("stat", "count") and filter("ServiceName", "*") and filter("ClusterName", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).scale(60)
